version_description: Data Update.
1. Open for service

1. Battlefield 7 added – The Ice Wall of Dawn
2. Maximum level expanded to Level 70
3. T6 upgrades added for all equipment
4. Skin system added
5. Collection medal missions expanded
6. Force Battle Bosses added : Broo Cold Mage, Minotaur
7. Achievement missions expanded
8. Login – “Checking Version” stage optimized
9. Bug fixes and improvements
1. Bug fixes and improvements

1. Realm of Lore difficulty expanded : Nightmare, Inferno
2. 4 new Karma equipment added
3. Bug fixes and improvements

1. Battlefield 8 added – Desert of the Hero King
2. Maximum level expanded – Lv. 80
3. Maximum upgrades expanded to T7 for all equipment
4. New Companions added
- Boy Chosen by the Relic – Teo
- Heir of the Art of the Steel Punch – Tiki
- Armor-Piercing Fist – Niki
- Ancient Archmage - Lady Terra
- Sorcerer of the Abyss - Raven
5. New Equipment in Pandora’s Workshop and Unknown Workshop : Skylark, Scarring Beast, Crimson Edge
6. Tower of Summoning maximum difficulty expanded – 40th floor
7. Function added for purchasing Skins with Emeralds
8. Combat difficulty eased : Campaign, Conquest, Realm of Lore, Advents
9. Expanded items sold at the General Shop : Gold Bars, Silver Bars, Bronze Bars, Mysterious Star Fragments, Miraculous Meteors
10. Tutorial optimization
11. Bug fixes and improvements

1. "Pet" system added
2. "Secret Shop" system added
3. "Exchange" system added
4. New equipment added - Guardian Set
- Guardian Revive Ring
- Guardian Cocoon Ring
- Guardian Belt
5. Bug fixes and improvement

1. Guild War content update
2. Guild War season reward added
- New Companion : Valein
- Skin : Guild Skins
3. Bug fixes and Improvements
1. Bug fixes and improvements
1. Certain devices’ login issue fixation
